descript.abstract:
This layer contains information on the land along existing regional trail corridors that is owned by the regional park operating agencies. The principal data source is the 2015 regional parcel data set (MetroGIS, Metropolitan Council).
Two datasets are included: parks_regional.shp: includes boundaries of parcels where they form subdivisions of parks parks_regional_Dissolve.shp: derived form the other dataset, this layer dissolves the data to have just one polygon per park and fewer attributes.
descript.purpose: This layer was created to show the Regional Park System for regional analysis and planning.
descript.supplinf: Twin Cities 7 County Metropolitan Area. This includes the counties of Anoka, Carver, Dakota, Hennepin, Ramsey, Scott and Washington in Minnesota.

timeperd.current: Data current as of the Time Period of Content Date above. Updated as new/corrected information becomes available.

theme.themekey: Regional Parks, Parks, Open Space, Recreation, Trails, Regional Trails

place.placekey: Twin Cities, Anoka County, Carver County, Dakota County, Hennepin County, Ramsey County, Scott County, Washington County

browse.browsed: Sample map showing the Regional_Trail_Land layer

citeinfo.title: Regional Parks; Regional Trails; Regional Park Search Areas; Regional Trail Search Corridors.

dataqual.complete: Entire seven county geographic area is covered.

horizpa.horizpar: The positional accuracy of the dataset has not been tested under the National Standards for Spatial Data Accuracy. The positional accuracy of the dataset is UNKNOWN

procstep.procdesc:
Data Source: 2015 regional parcel data set (MetroGIS, Metropolitan Council).
Accuracy: see "MetroGIS Regional Parcel Dataset".

spdoinfo.mgmg3til: One layer for entire seven county region.

overview.eaover:
Attributes for Regional_Trail_Land:
COUNTY_ID: Three-character county ID
PIN: Parcel PIN ID ("Multiple" if multiplce parcels grouped together)
CITY: City in which parcel(s) are located
OWNER_NAME: Parcel owner name
TAX_NAME: Parcel tax-payer name
XUSE1_DESC: Parcel use description
NAME: Associated regional trail name
LABEL: Map label
TYPE: "Regional Trail Corridor"
ACRES: Calculated arceage for each parcel or group of parcels

If you transmit or provide the GIS Data (or any portion of it) to another user, it is recommended that the GIS Data include a copy of this disclaimer and this metadata.
